businessUnit.description: Business Unit: unit smaller than an Operating Company, but bigger than a Team

product.description: Product: the name of the software product this component is part of

name.description: Component Name: the common display name this component is known by (only if different to repository)

lifecycleStage.description:
Lifecycle stage: One of 'Pre-release', 'Active', 'Deprecated'
Where:
* 'Deprecated' is equivalent to 'End of life', 'Retired', 'Obsolete', 'Sunset'
* 'Experiment' is equivalent to 'Proof of concept', 'Prototype', 'Test', 'Demo', 'Sandbox'

cloudPlatform.description: Platform where this is being deployed (e.g. AWS, GitHub, Azure)

jira.description: Link to your JIRA project or board

wiki.description: Link to Confluence or other external documentation source

msTeams.description: Link to your MS Team channel, if you have one
